rules_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Utsuho Reiuji attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature defending player controls.
☢ [i]CAUTION !![/i] ☢ – {1}{R}{R}, Discard three cards: Triple Utsuho Reiuji's power until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“Lord Yatagarasu, the Black Sun. Thank you for giving me your power.”[/i]
